PHRASE.LANG:
The Captain's Lounge

As you push forward, something pushes back. In a spine-chilling tone, you hear these words, "Whodya think ya are? Yur not ready for what's up there! Ya need more achievements before yur a real Captain. And only real Captains can go up there."

The Admiral's Club

When you try to go up, something is keeping you down. An inebriated voice comes out of nowhere, "Don't be blockin' the stairs! Make room fur the best of the best! Only the bestest best go up. If yur up, then yur the best."

Blackbeard's Treasure Room

From all around you comes this warning, "Ya be wantin' to lose a limb? Those stairs be only fur the master himself. No one goes up those stairs. Or should I say, no one comes down."

Blackbeard's Challenge

We're looking for the greatest outcasts, rejects, outsiders, castaways, misfits, loners, and undesirables. That unique set of gaming experiences that adds to everyone's fun. Sign up and join the fight!
